This file was created on 2021-01-23 and last modified on `r Sys.Date()`.

Use table patient_type in EHR data mart. Order all the fields by 
Pat_type_desc and print just the first four rows from the table.

```{r q1}
library(sqldf)
db <- dbConnect(SQLite(),
dbname="../data/ehr.sqlite")
ordered_data <- dbGetQuery(conn=db,
 "select *
    from patient_type
    order by Pat_type_desc
    limit 4")
ordered_data
dbDisconnect(conn=db)
```
